function.name: get_status
function.description: Get enhanced git status with AI insights, file modification stats, and branch context. Use this to understand the current state of the repository.

function.name: analyze_history
function.description: Analyze recent commit history, including authors, conventions, and activity patterns.

function.name: version_info
function.description: Get current project version information using S4 versioning (Semantic + Date/Time).

function.name: generate_commit_message
function.description: Generate a high-quality commit message based on currently staged changes.

context.description: Optional context or user instruction for the message generation

function.name: run_git_command
function.description: Execute a raw git command safely. Use this for standard git operations not covered by other tools.

command.description: The full git command to run (e.g., 'log -n 5', 'branch --list')
